text: "Whistle" is an electropop song by American rapper Flo Rida and is the third single from his fourth studio album Wild Ones. The song was released on April 24, 2012. It topped the single charts in Australia, Brazil, Bulgaria, Canada, Ireland, Israel, New Zealand, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Scotland, Slovakia, Sweden, Switzerland and the United States. It also went to number 2 in Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Lebanon and the United Kingdom and number 3 in Denmark, Finland and Italy. == Track listing == *;Digital download # "Whistle" – 3:45 *;CD single # "Whistle" – 3:48 # "Wild Ones" (Alex Guesta remix) – 6:59 == References == Category:2012 songs Category:Flo Rida songs Category:Electropop songs Category:Rap songs
title: Whistle (Flo Rida song)
